links.*: Of the Coming of the Elves

wikitext.*:
{{Main|Timeline}} == [[Years of the Trees]] == :''All dates in this section are approximate. Calculated solar years for the Years of Trees are rounded to the nearest year.''One [[Valian Years|Valian Year]] is equal to 9.582 solar years. {|class="wikitable" |- ! '''{{YT}}''' !! '''{{YS}}''' !! '''Event''' |- | colspan="3" align="center" |'''''Before the First Age''''' |- | [[Year of the Trees 1|1]] || 1 || '''[[Yavanna]] creates the [[Two Trees]] amidst the hill of [[Ezellohar]] in [[Valinor]].''' With [[Telperion]]'s first blooming the new [[Time|Count of Time]] begins.{{AA}}§24§29
Over the many centuries, [[Morgoth|Melkor]] dwells in [[Utumno]].§30 [[Oromë]] hunts throughout [[Middle-earth]].§31 Melkor raises the [[Misty Mountains|Hithaeglir]] to hinder his efforts.§61 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1000|1000]] || 9582 || The [[Valar]] hold council, for [[Yavanna]] and [[Oromë]] report that [[Melkor]] might rise once more in power. They discuss the [[Children of Ilúvatar]].§32 Over the next fifty years, [[Varda]] fashions new stars and begins to organize them and those already wrought into [[:Category:Constellations|constellations]].§35
'''Some time before the waking of the Elves, [[Aulë]] secretly creates the 7 [[Fathers of the Dwarves]] and their 6 spouses. Ilúvatar adopts them and they are put to sleep.{{Cite DTP|S QS}}'''{{Cite DTP|S QS.02}} |- | colspan="3" align="center" |'''''First Age''''' |- | [[Year of the Trees 1050|1050]] || 10,061 || [[Varda]] forms the [[Valacirca]].§36 '''The first 144 [[Elves]] ([[Minyar]], [[Tatyar]], and [[Nelyar]]){{WJ|Quendi}}, p. 380 awake in [[Cuiviénen]].§37 The [[First Age]] begins.'''{{LE|131}}: "''... First Age, from the coming of the Eldar to its end with overthrow of Morgoth-melkor, the first Dark Lord.''"
[[Melian]] travels to [[Beleriand]] after ascending [[Taniquetil]] to see the stars.§40 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1080|1080]] || 10,349 || Spies of Melkor discover the Elves and afflict them.{{GA}}§4 It is possible through the torture of Melkor that [[Orcs]] are first created.§45 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1085|1085]] || 10,396 || [[Oromë]] discovers the [[Elves]], and calls them the [[Eldar]].§§41–2 The Eldar are afraid of Oromë and blame him for [[Morgoth|Melkor]]'s work.§§43–4 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1086|1086]] || 10,406 || [[Oromë]] returns to [[Valinor]] and witnesses to his peers about the Children of Ilúvatar, then returns to the [[Elves]] while the Valar consider his message.§46 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1090|1090]] || 10,444 || The [[Valar]] make war on [[Morgoth|Melkor]] in the [[Battle of the Powers]].§§47–8 The shores of Beleriand are formed and bays are created on the North.§6 Over the next two years, Melkor is defeated and retreats into [[Utumno]].§48 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1092|1092]] || 10,464 || The siege of Utumno begins. The earth is shaken; the North is desolated and the Sea widened.§49 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1099|1099]] || 10,530 || The [[Battle of the Powers]] ends as the Valar storm the final defences of [[Utumno]]. [[Tulkas]] captures [[Morgoth|Melkor]] and binds him with [[Angainor]].§50
[[Sauron]] evades capture.{{Cite DTP|S QS.03}} |- | [[Year of the Trees 1100|1100]] || 10,540 || [[Morgoth|Melkor]] is brought back to Valinor, judged and cast into the [[Halls of Mandos]] for three Ages of the Valar (300 Valian Years).§§51–2 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1101|1101]] || 10,550 || The [[Valar]] make council about the protection of the [[Children of Ilúvatar]] and decide to bring them to Valinor. Oromë extends this invitation to the Elves.§53 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1102|1102]] || 10,559 || The Elves are unwilling to leave [[Cuiviénen]]. Oromë invites three Elven ambassadors, [[Ingwë]], [[Finwë]] and [[Elwë]] to come to Valinor with the hope that they can convince their people to come as well.§§54–5 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1104|1104]] || 10,579 || The ambassadors return to [[Cuiviénen]] and invite the Elves to return with them to Valinor.§56 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1105|1105]] || 10,588 || First [[Sundering of the Elves]] at [[Cuiviénen]]. The [[Vanyar]] led by Ingwë, the [[Noldor]] led by [[Finwë]] and the [[Teleri]] led by Elwë and [[Olwë]] depart.§§57–8 The [[Avari]], led by [[Morwë]] and [[Nurwë]], stay in Cuiviénen.§57
The [[Eldar]] pass [[Sea of Helcar]] and turn west. Some are terrified by the smokes of war and go back.§58 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1115|1115]] || 10,684 || Second [[Sundering of the Elves]]: The [[Eldar]] host passes [[Mirkwood|Greenwood]] the Great and comes to the River [[Anduin]].§60 The Teleri wish to stay there, terrified by the [[Misty Mountains|Hithaeglir]]. [[Nandor|A part]] of them go south led by [[Lenwë]].§62 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1125|1125]] || 10,780 || The [[Vanyar]] and [[Noldor]] enter [[Beleriand]]; the foremost of them pass [[Sirion]] and reach the shores. Oromë goes to Aman for counsel.§63 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1128|1128]] || 10,808 || The unwilling Teleri also come to Beleriand and dwell east of [[Gelion]].§64 Elwë often visits Finwë in the lands of the Noldor where later will be the forests of [[Neldoreth]] and [[Region]].§9 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1130|1130]] || 10,828 || Elwë, returning from a meeting with Finwë, meets Melian in [[Nan Elmoth]]. They fall into a trance.§65 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1132|1132]] || 10,847 || [[Ulmo]] brings [[Tol Eressëa|an island]] to the [[Bay of Balar]]. The Vanyar and Noldor forget their fear for the Sea and embark upon it while the Teleri stay in Beleriand to look for Elwë.§§11–2 While departing, the island breaks and leaves the [[Isle of Balar]] behind.§11
After learning of the departure of the Vanyar and Noldor, Olwë leads some Teleri to the [[Mouths of Sirion]] where they meet [[Ossë]] and [[Uinen]].§12 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1133|1133]] || 10,856 || The [[Vanyar]] and [[Noldor]] enter [[Aman]] and [[Valinor]] and possess [[Eldamar]].§67{{Cite DTP|S QS.05}}{{MR|P3I5}}§38 The Valar open the rift [[Calacirya]] in the Pelóri so that the [[Light of Valinor]] reaches Eldamar where the Elves may still see the stars. The Elves begin the building of the hill [[Túna]] and [[Tirion]] upon it inside Calacirya. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1140|1140]] || 10,923 || The [[Vanyar]] and [[Noldor]] found [[Tirion]] and [[Mindon Eldaliéva]]. Some Vanyar yearn for the Trees and move to Valinor.§68 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1142|1142]] || 10,943 || [[Yavanna]] gives the [[Noldor]] the [[Galathilion|White Tree]].§69 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1149|1149]] || 11,010 || Ulmo summons the Teleri to Aman in answer to the prayers of Finwë.§70§§13–4 However, Ossë is grieved to lose the Teleri and persuades some to stay with him in Beleriand. These are called the Falathrim, who afterwards§36 establish the havens of [[Brithombar]] and [[Eglarest]],§14 and whose lord is [[Círdan]]. [[Ossë]] teaches them shipcraft. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1150|1150]] || 11,019 || [[Olwë]] and the most part of the Teleri leave Beleriand on [[Tol Eressëa]]. The rest of the Teleri remain to search for Elwë and are named the [[Eglath]].§71§§13–5 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1151|1151]] || 11,029 || At the begging of the [[Teleri]] who heard the calls of [[Ossë]], [[Ulmo]] halts Tol Eressëa outside the [[Bay of Eldamar]].§§72–3 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1152|1152]] || 11,038 || [[Elwë]] and [[Melian]] awaken from their trance. [[Elwë]] becomes the King of the Elves in [[Beleriand]].§74§16 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1161|1161]] || 11,125 || [[Ossë]] teaches the [[Teleri]] how to build ships; they leave Tol Eressëa and come to Valinor.§75 The Teleri who reach Valinor are afterwards named the [[Falmari]].{{MR|P3I3}}, §27 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1162|1162]] || 11,134 || The [[Teleri]] begin building [[Alqualondë]] with the help of [[Finwë]].§76 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1165|1165]] || 11,134 || The last [[Vanyar]] depart from [[Tirion]] to live on western [[Taniquetil]] with the Valar.§77{{NM|P1xxii}}, p. 164 The [[Noldor]] remain in Tirion and develop stronger ties to the [[Teleri]]. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1169|1169]] || 11,201 || Birth of [[Fëanor]], son of [[Finwë]] and [[Míriel]].§78Note 1, p. 101
Masons of the House of Finwë discover gems while quarrying.§79
[[Rúmil (elf of Tirion)|Rúmil of Tirion]] makes the first letters (possibly the [[Sarati]]) and records songs and wisdom (possibly the [[Ainulindalë (Rúmil's work)|Ainulindalë]]).§80 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1170|1170]] || 11,211 || Death of [[Míriel|Míriel Serindë]]. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1172|1172]] || 11,230 || The [[Statute of Finwë and Míriel|Doom of Manwë]] is proclaimed. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1182|1182]] || 11,325 || Finwë is allowed to marry again.Note 4, p. 101{{MR|P3II2}}, pp. 206–7 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1185|1185]] || 11,355 || [[Finwë]] weds [[Indis]]. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1190|1190]] || 11,403 || Birth of [[Fingolfin]] in Aman.§81 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1200|1200]] || 11,498 || Second Age of the Chaining of Melkor.§17
Traditional dating of the birth of [[Lúthien]] in [[Neldoreth]]. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1230|1230]] || 11,786 || Birth of [[Finarfin]] in Aman.§82 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1250|1250]] || 11,978 || [[Fëanor]] creates the [[Tengwar]].§83
[[Dwarves]], also known as Naugrim, enter [[Beleriand]] and meet the Elves.§19 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1260|1260]] || 12,073 || Birth of [[Fingon]] in Aman. Last of the [[Vanyar]] leave [[Tirion]]. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1280|1280]] || 12,265 || [[Finarfin]] weds [[Eärwen]].§85 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1300|1300]] || 12,457 || Third Age of the Chaining of Melkor.§22
The births of [[Turgon]] and [[Finrod]] in Aman.Note on §85, p. 106
The [[Dwarves of Belegost]] and the [[Sindar]] begin the building of [[Menegroth]] in [[Doriath]]. The Dwarves are paid with knowledge from Melian and with many pearls, including [[Nimphelos]].§§22–4
[[Daeron]] creates the [[Cirth|Certhas Daeron]].Note on §31, p. 110 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1330|1330]] || 12,744 || [[Orcs]] are first seen in [[Beleriand]].§§26–7[[#Y.T. 1330|NB]] The Dwarves make weapons for the Sindar.§§28–9 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1350|1350]] || 12,936 || [[Denethor (Nando)|Denethor]] leads some of the [[Nandor]] west into Beleriand and befriends [[Thingol]]. They settle in [[Ossiriand]].§30
Daeron betters{{fact}} the Cirth, which are adopted by the Dwarves and made known east of the [[Blue Mountains]].§31 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1362|1362]] || 13,051 || Births of [[Galadriel]] in Eldamar and [[Aredhel]] in Tirion.Note on §86, p. 106 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1400|1400]] || 13,415 || [[Morgoth|Melkor]] is released from bondage.§§87–8 He dwells in Valimar under vigilance.§89 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1410|1410]] || 13,511 || [[Morgoth|Melkor]] is allowed to walk freely in Valinor, allowing him to befriend the [[Noldor]].§§89–91 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1449|1449]] || 13,884 || [[Fëanor]] begins constructing the [[Silmarils]].§92 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1450|1450]] || 13,894 || '''[[Fëanor]] completes the [[Silmarils]].§93 He puts the Light of the Trees in them and Varda hallows them.'''§§93–4
For the next forty years, Melkor begins spreading strife and urging the need for weapons.§§95–8 Fëanor expresses his desire to reject the Valar and return to Middle Earth.{{MR|P3II6}}§52c |- | [[Year of the Trees 1479|1479]] || 14,172 || ''Possible'' birth of [[Idril]].{{NM|P1x}}, p. 72Tolkien calculated this birthyear under a later assumptions that the Crossing of the Ice occurred entirely within Y.T. 1496, rather than ending in Y.T. 1500, and that one Valian Year equaled 144 solar years. (Had the previous chronology been left intact, he would have calculated a birthyear of Y.T. 1483.) |- | [[Year of the Trees 1490|1490]] || 14,277 || Finwë summons Fëanor to a council meeting, where he threatens Fingolfin with his sword.§99§52e–g The Valar then exile Fëanor to [[Formenos]] for 12 years.§53c[[#Y.T. 1490|NB]] He takes his seven sons§53d and Finwë follows him as well. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1492|1492]] || 14,296 || Melkor visits Fëanor in Formenos, but he repels him.§§101–3 Finwë then warns the Valar, who pursue Melkor.§§103–4 Melkor flees and finds [[Ungoliant]] in [[Avathar]].§§104–6 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1495|1495]] || 14,325 || Fëanor is summoned by Manwë to Taniquetil where he and Fingolfin reconcile.§§110–2 '''Ungoliant destroys the Two Trees.§113 Melkor kills Finwë in Formenos and steals the Silmarils.§122 Fëanor names him Morgoth.§123 He and his sons swear the [[Oath of Fëanor]].'''§134 '''They begin a rebellion of the Noldor against the Valar and go to Alqualondë where they [[First Kinslaying|slay the Teleri]] and steal their swanships.'''§§136–50 '''This begins the [[Flight of the Noldor]].'''{{MR|P3I7}}
Melkor and Ungoliant flee to Beleriand where Ungoliant threatens him.§§125–6 Melkor calls Balrogs to his aid and they drive Ungoliant away.§126 Melkor, now known as Morgoth, stays in [[Angband]] and raises the peaks of [[Thangorodrim]].§§127–8 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1496|1496]] || 14,335 || [[Mandos]] appears before the Noldor and speaks the [[Doom of Mandos]].§§151–4 Finarfin and some of his people repent and return to Valinor.§156 Finrod, son of Finarfin, becomes the leader of his father's remaining people{{fact}} and they follow Fëanor. |- | [[Year of the Trees 1497|1497]] || 14,344 || The [[First Battle of Beleriand]].§§36–40 Death of [[Denethor (Nando)|Denethor]].§39 Besiegement of the [[Havens of the Falas]].§40 Thingol withdraws his people and Melian sets the [[Girdle of Melian]] around Doriath. The [[Laiquendi]] become hidden and take no other king.
The Noldor arrive at the [[Helcaraxë]].§157 Fëanor and his people betray Fingolfin and sail to Beleriand.§159
They land in Drengist seven years after the First Battle of Beleriand.§41 '''Burning of the ships at [[Losgar]].§§161–2
The [[Dagor-nuin-Giliath]] ("Battle-under-Stars").§§44–5 [[Gothmog (balrog)|Gothmog]] mortally wounds Fëanor, who is rescued by his sons before dying near [[Thangorodrim]].'''§§45–6
[[Maedhros]] meets with Morgoth under a false truce and is captured.§49 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1498|1498]] || 14,354 || [[Maedhros]] is chained to the [[Thangorodrim]]. The Noldor fortify a great camp in [[Hithlum]],§51 likely near the north-shore of Lake Mithrim.§§58–9 |- | [[Year of the Trees 1500|1500]] || 14,373 || ''' The Creation of the [[Moon]] and the [[Sun]].§§168–73 The host of the [[Noldor]], led by [[Fingolfin]], finishes crossing the [[Helcaraxë]] and enters the Northern Lands.'''§173§§52–5 The [[Battle of the Lammoth]] and death of [[Argon]].{{PM|Shibboleth}}Note 38, p. 362 The Moon rises seven times, after which the Sun follows. '''The First Age continues.''' |} ==Discrepancies== ===Y.T. 1330=== Tolkien also considered YT 1320 for the first year of Orcs in Beleriand. ===Y.T. 1490=== In the ''Annals of Aman'' and the first phase of the Later ''Quenta Silmarillion'', his exile is written as twenty years.{{MR|P3I6}}, §53 {{references|notes}}
